application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposal fails to demonstrate the details submitted in relation to the disposal of sewage would provide adequate drainage facilities. The proposal would therefore not be in accordance with Policies SI 5, SI 8, SI 12, SI 13 of the London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1 U of the Harrow Core Strategy and Policies DM9 and DM10 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Reason : 2 - The proposal fails to demonstrate the details submitted in relation to the disposal of surface water would provide adequate drainage facilities. The proposal would therefore not be in accordance with Policies SI 5, SI 8, SI 12, SI 13 of the London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1 U of the Harrow Core Strategy and Policies DM 9 and DM 10 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

description: Details pursuant to Condition 4 (disposal of sewage) and Condition 5 (disposal of surface water) of planning permission P/3177/20 Dated 10.12.2020 for Conversion of dwelling into four flats (1 X 1 bed, 2 x 2  bed and 1 X 3 bed); single storey front extension; single storey side extension; single and two storey rear extension; single storey rear extension; alterations to roof to raise ridge height; rear dormer; external alterations.
